artifacts.description: Bundle manifest (root of truth): bundle_id, timestamps, and hashed artifact inventory.
Offline verification output (PASS/FAIL) with findings and exit_code.
Decision record line (JSONL): event -> policy+authority evaluation -> outcome+reason_code (+ optional effect).
Policy material bound to baseline+contract_ref, hashed for reproducibility.
Aggregated containment metrics for a run/wave (typed values with units).
Evidence inventory: role->path->sha256 (+ optional size/content_type) for verification.
